text:
Sony Entertainment Television India is an Indian Hindi Language television channel from India. It was based general Entertainment. The was broadcast show's like, Aadalat,C.I.D,Bhoot Aaya,Maharana Pratap,Kya Hua Tera Vaada, Behyad,The Kapil Sharma Show,Hasil and Prithvi Vallabh - Itihaas Bhi,Rahasya Bhi.
The channel was launched on 8 November 1995, the Indian television channel was owned by Sony Pictures Networks
